Description: Increases the effect of Crack, Poison and Slow by 50%.Reduces the effect of Fast, Sharp and Wet by 50%.Prevents 1 Reinforce per charge, remove 1 charge when this happens.Removes Reinforce from the target when applied.Remove 1 charge at the end of the turn.
